name: Dracoslayer
description:
Dracoslayer is a fighting game title with a heavy emphasis on elemental abilities and PvE action.　

You can present various strategies and tactics based on the combination of each unique skill, and use the elemental properties to manipulate the battle field.
Defeat your enemies and claim victory!

Enjoy fluid controls through simple and intuitive motion inputs, and a free-flowing immersive combat experience.

Story Mode:
The Story Mode features an adventure set in the world of Dracoslayer, where you defeat waves of enemies and multiple bosses.

Versus Mode:
Dracoslayer features an 1v1 battle mode, where players can experience fighting each other locally, or fighting a computer controlled opponent.
